title: Science Education Design Workshop Utilizing IDT Studio

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Project-based science education design referencing multidisciplinary design studio cases.

learning_goals: Learners can solve science education design problems by applying a design studio methodology.
Learners can design and execute an IDT studio process from a multidisciplinary perspective.
Learners can improve science education solutions through peer feedback and iterative prototyping.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
